name: Ariel Marcus
summary: Over eight years of experience building machine learning applications at Spotify with Python, Scala, Java, BigTable, and gRPC. Currently a Senior Software Engineer at Netflix.
work_history: Netflix: Senior Software Engineer (April 2024 - Present). Recurse Center: Participant (January 2024 - March 2024). Spotify: Senior Software Engineer (October 2023 - December 2023). Found: Senior Software Engineer (September 2022 - October 2023). dbt Labs: Senior Software Engineer (February 2022 - September 2022). Spotify: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (March 2014 - February 2022). LinkedIn: Senior Insights Analyst (April 2013 - March 2014). OpenBI: Consultant (February 2011 - April 2013). Booth School of Business: Research Assistant (October 2010 - January 2011).
project_history: At OpenBI, built the data warehouse for analysis of the NYT's website data on Hadoop and modeled subscriber vs. non-subscriber behavior on the NYT's site. At Booth School of Business, implemented a study to determine the impact of incentives on test performance and coordinated the hiring and management of ten research assistants.
skills: Natural Language Processing (NLP), TypeScript, PyTorch, Python, Scala, Java, BigTable, gRPC
education: Stanford University: Non-Degree, Machine Learning (December 2021 - March 2022). University of Chicago: Bachelor's Degree, History (2010). Certifications: Natural Language Processing, Neural Networks and Deep Learning, Sequence Models, dbt Fundamentals, Convolutional Neural Networks.
